Posts.EditableText: I'm Still Following Quest and will still be working on World of Wonder, Just been busy in r/l, Looking fer a Job etc
Posts.HTML: I'm Still Following Quest and will still be working on World of Wonder, Just been busy in r/l, Looking fer a Job etc

Posts.EditableText: heh, i work at McDonalds. and the reason i havent been posting (Im Gwerradon), is because Feudal Online has taken up most of my time. we've built the server, and are now working on the client. i think the gameplay will be fairly good, and unlike some text-based muds, it will have a decent story line, and something to achieve. Its based around the Feudal Age, so it will have all the feudal weapons and armor etc, and ive mixed in some fantasy classes like battlemages, and wizards, just to spice things up a bit, and ill be working on the client interface soon
